Terms & Conditions

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using eBLOOD, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the website.

2. Eligibility

You must be at least 18 years old to use eBLOOD . By using the website, you confirm that you meet this eligibility requirement.

3. User Registration

Registration on the website requires providing correct and genuine information. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete details during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

4. Blood Donation Guidelines

  • a. You must meet the eligibility criteria for blood donation as established by relevant health authorities.
  • b. All information provided regarding your health status, medical history, and eligibility for blood donation must be accurate.

5. Changes to Terms and Conditions

eBLOOD, reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website. Your continued use of the website after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

eBLOOD Donor Coupon Details

OM Shankar Vilas Restaurant - Coupon

By accessing and using eBLOOD, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the website.

  • The coupon is valid for Dine-in only.
  • No Takeaway or parcels are allowed.
  • This coupon is not applicable after the validity expires.
  • The coupon is applicable for a group of 4 members only. Kids aged 5 years or older are counted as members for calculating discounts.
  • There is no cap on the maximum discount limit. You can bill any amount, and you will receive a flat 50% off.
  • If any extra members arrive, the bill will be on a pro-rata basis (calculations below are for illustrative purposes only).
  • This coupon is not applicable after the validity expires.

Example 1 : If 4 members visit the OM Shankar Vilas and the bill is 4000/-, then you need to pay 2000/- (2000/- is the discount).
Example 2 : If 6 members visit the OM Shankar Vilas, and the bill is 6000/-, the calculation is as follows: Bill per person is 6000/6 = 1000/- Bill for 4 members is 1000*4 = 4000/- As the coupon is applicable for 4 members, a 50% discount will be applicable for the bill of 4 members. Total discount = 4000/2 = 2000/- Final bill is 6000 – 2000 = 4000/- (pro-rata basis).
Example 3 : If 2 members visit the OM Shankar Vilas and the bill is 2000/-, then you need to pay only 1000/- (1000/- is the discount).

  • Coupons can be clubbed. If 2 members donate blood through eBLOOD, then the 2 coupons are applicable for 8 members (max) in a single shot.
  • Coupons cannot be combined with any other offers, promotions, or discounts unless explicitly stated.
  • Coupons should be redeemed in full. Partial coupon redemption is not possible.
  • Coupons are not refundable in cash or replaceable if lost, destroyed, or stolen. Please keep your coupon safely.
  • Coupons should match the Serial No and the Coupon code. If there is any ambiguity, then OM Shankar Vilas/Friends For Seva has the right to dismiss the coupon.
  • Friends For Seva/OM Shankar Vilas reserves the right to refuse service or cancel the discount if there is any suspicion of fraudulent activity or misuse of the coupons.
  • Any attempt to manipulate or exploit the terms and conditions may result in the immediate invalidation of the coupon and the forfeiture of any associated benefits.
  • Friends For Seva/OM Shankar Vilas reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time, with or without prior notice.
  • Friends For Seva/OM Shankar Vilas reserve the right to cancel coupons without any notice.

Ruthuvu Online Cloth Store - Coupon

By accessing and using eBLOOD, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the website.

  • Coupon is redeemable on www.ruthuvu.com only. Offline redemption is not allowed.
  • Coupon is valid only once.
  • Coupons are valid until the specified expiry date. After expiry, the coupon can't be redeemed.
  • Coupon can be transferred to friends/family members.
  • Coupons cannot be combined with any other offers, promotions, or discounts unless explicitly stated.
  • Coupons are not refundable in cash or replaceable if lost, destroyed, or stolen. Please keep your coupon safely.
  • Ruthuvu/Friends For Seva reserves the right to refuse service or cancel the discount if there is any suspicion of fraudulent activity or misuse of the coupons.
  • Ruthuvu/Friends For Seva reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time, with or without prior notice.
  • Any attempt to manipulate or exploit the terms and conditions may result in the immediate invalidation of the coupon and the forfeiture of any associated benefits.
  • Ruthuvu/Friends For Seva reserves the right to cancel coupons without any notice.

Sravan Dental Clinic - Coupon

By accessing and using eBLOOD, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the website.

  • For Blood Donors :
    • Free OP,
    • Basic Extraction 250/-,
    • Basic Scaling 300/-,
    • Flat 20-30% discounts on all treatments
      (No Max limit).
  • For registered donors on eBLOOD :
    • Free OP,
    • Basic Extraction 350/-,
    • Basic Scaling 400/-
  • To avail benefit for the registered donors, registered donors have to show that they messaged to +91 7661 80 81 82 (friends for seva society no) and filled the form in whatsapp to the Sravan dental clinic crew.
  • Coupon is valid TWICE during the validity period.
  • Coupon can be transferrable to friends/family members.
  • Coupons cannot be combined with any other offers, promotions, or discounts unless explicitly stated.
  • Coupons are not refundable in cash or replaceable if lost, destroyed, or stolen. Please keep your coupon safely.
  • Coupons should match the Serial No and the Coupon code. If there is any ambiguity, then Sravan Dental Clinic/Friends For Seva has the right to dismiss the coupon.
  • Sravan Dental Clinic/Friends For Seva reserves the right to refuse service or cancel the discount if there is any suspicion of fraudulent activity or misuse of the coupons.
  • Any attempt to manipulate or exploit the terms and conditions may result in the immediate invalidation of the coupon and the forfeiture of any associated benefits.
  • Sravan Dental Clinic/Friends For Seva reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time, with or without prior notice.
  • Sravan Dental Clinic/Friends For Seva reserve the right to cancel coupons without any notice.
